New Records: Kevin De Bruyne was named Player of the Match
Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored inside two minutes
De Bruyne had chances throughout a polished Belgian performance and doubled the lead with 10 minutes left
De Bruyne prods Belgium’s second past Nita (BEL 2-0 ROU)
64’ NO GOAL! Belgium’s second is chalked off for offside (BEL 1-0 ROU)
63’ GOAL! Lukaku meets De Bruyne’s pass and scores (BEL 2-0 ROU)
18’ SAVE! Nita denies Lukebakio with fine leaping stop (BEL 1-0 ROU)
Pre-Game Insights: The consequences of beating Romania mean that all four teams in Group E have three points after two games each
Post-Match Reflections: Uefa’s Technical Observer Panel said: “He made the difference for Belgium as they claimed their first points. Once again, he was the key player for his side.”
Miscellaneous Highlights: Four teams are all locked on three points. Group E is going down to a final day shootout next Wednesday.
